mapper.insert: INSERT INTO price_service ( cpy_id, pse_no, pse_name, pse_price, pse_remark, pse_createtime, pse_createuser, pse_is_sx, pse_sxtime, pse_jstime, pse_ntype, pse_showurl ) VALUES ( #{cpyId}, #{pseNo}, #{pseName}, #{psePrice}, #{pseRemark}, #{pseCreatetime}, #{pseCreateuser}, #{pseIsSx}, #{pseSxtime}, #{pseJstime}, #{pseNtype}, #{pseShowurl} )
mapper.select: SELECT pse_no AS pseNo, pse_is_sx AS pseIsSx FROM price_service WHERE cpy_id = #{cpyId}
mapper.update: UPDATE price_service SET pse_createtime = #{pseCreatetime}, pse_createuser = #{pseCreateuser}, pse_no = #{pseNo} WHERE cpy_id = #{cpyId}
